Super slow and also not that smart.. You're taking too much time to decide on diving or not.. If you're too slow then the enemy hero's skills might be already available and might escape or kill you, and enemies can dodge your skills if you're too slow, idk why your enemies is so bad.. but while you're playing gusion, you will also need fast combos and fast hands so that your enemies can't even react while you're killing them in seconds, But nice work on that last kill, you waited for your skills to cooldown before diving but your combo is pathetic, BTW im a gusion main, 600+ matches, 63.5% winrate, ID: 191203131 (sorry for bad english)

Im sorry bro, but in the future your low stars operators will not be able to keep up with the enemies. And if you need cheap operators to fend off early enemies you can just use vanguard, fast snipers (bp, exu) or just use myrtle to collect deployment points, so the low stars having low cost is not a big deal. Idk why people are saying that its about your strategy and not about your operator but in reality, they are just watching guides on youtube to complete a stage. But there are some strong 4 star operators like myrtle, coura

WRITING.TITLE: [OC][Fanart] My Negative Drawing of Zenitsu from Demon Slayer

WRITING.TEXT: Should i still invest on manticore even though I already have magallan/her drones (1st skill) and ethan?

Her drones are useless? Her drones is the best thing about her bro. Her 1st skill's slow is very good, if you combine it with manticore the enemies will barely move (i use it at cc area 59 to reach risk 14). And her 2nd skill's damage (active) is on par with astesia with 2nd skill and maybe it's much better because astesia can only hit 2 enemies while her drones (active skill) can hit all enemies, so you can put that drone on front of your defender or you can use it to assassinate someone (her drones cannot be targeted for first seconds of deployment, so she is good on assassination). Her 3rd skill is also good, it's like 3 mini meteorites, you can use it when the stage restricts you to bring less operators, it can also replace your snipers if you dont have any good snipers. She has many roles so i recommend investing on her.
